#summary How to run the RDFQuery unit tests

The following assumes that you have the rdfquery package installed in $RDFQHOME. 

== Setting up to run the tests ==

  * Create the directory $RDFQHOME/jquery
  * Copy the [http://jqueryjs.googlecode.com/files/jquery-1.3.2.js jQuery 1.3.2 development javascript] into $RDFQHOME/jquery
  * Create the directory $RDFQHOME/jquery/tests/qunit
  * Copy the latest qunit [http://view.jquery.com/trunk/qunit/testrunner.js testrunner.js] and [http://view.jquery.com/trunk/qunit/testsuite.css testsuite.css] into $RDFQHOME/jquery/tests/qunit
  * Copy the [http://jquery-json.googlecode.com/files/jquery.json-1.3.min.js jquery.json-1.3.min.js plugin code] into $RDFQHOME/jquery

==Running the tests==

You can run all the tests by accessing $RDFQHOME/tests/jquery.alltests.html
